import React, { useState } from "react" function Tasks() { const [taskAdded, setTaskAdded] = useState(false) function handleNewTask(){ setTaskAdded(true) } function handleTaskAddToList(e) { e.preventDefault() fetch("http://localhost:9292", { method: 'POST', headers: { "Content-Type":"application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify() }) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) } return (
Current Tasks
{taskAdded ?

: }
) } export default Tasks
